content: X-MS BW Cable stacker with batwings MC/AC cable stacker with batwing clip for supporting multiple metal-clad/armored cables to a drop rod ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Tool-free installation – safer and easier to handle Non-slip hold – batwing grips firmly to the drop rod Easy cable insertion – either dropped in while open, or pulled through while closed Designed for future changes – cable stacker can be easily reopened for post-installation and maintenance of cables Applications Support for metal-clad or armored (type MC/AC) cables on a drop rod Support for EMT conduits on the drop rod ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Conduit Fastening, Cable Fastenings Material: Carbon steel Base materials: Concrete Technical Data | Application | Conduit Fastening, Cable Fastenings | Material | Carbon steel | Base materials | Concrete | Approvals (global) | UL | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | MC cable capacity (max) | 7 | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2256718 - X-MS 3 MC stacker with batwing clip for rod attachment - Package Size 50 pc
